column4: what is the command to reset Samba username an password so i can access the linux machine from windows. I can already see it I just cant access files on it yet.
System -> Administration -> Shared Folders (if you have gui) - otherwise /mgs ubotu samba
make a folder on the drive with 'sudo mkdir /path/to/folder' then make it usable by your user with 'sudo chown username:username /path/to/folder'
and ameyer ...will try those solutions now...brb
